meta.name: Automated Course Registration Evaluation with AI, Gmail, and Google Sheets

parameters.formTitle: API testing and Automation Mastery Program - Enrollment Form

values.html:
API Testing & Automation Training Enrollment

Please complete the form below to enroll in our comprehensive hands-on training program focused on API Testing & Automation using Postman and RestAssured.

üìö Course Overview

  • Schedule: 3 days per week
  • Sessions: 2 recorded Zoom sessions daily (1.5 hours each)
  • Total Weekly Time: ~5+ hours/week
  • Content Focus: Demo projects only (no real-world projects)
  • Certification: No certificate ‚Äì focus is on practical skills

üß† Course Content

  • üîπ Introduction to APIs & API Testing Fundamentals
  • üîπ API Testing and Automation using Postman
  • üîπ API Test Automation using Newman (Postman CLI Runner)
  • üîπ API Testing and Automation using RestAssured (Java)
  • üîπ Data-driven Testing & Environment Variables
  • üîπ API Testing with Cucumber (BDD Framework)
  • üîπ CI/CD Integration for API Automation (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, etc.)
  • üîπ Generating Professional Reports
  • üîπ Version Control with Git & GitHub

üí≥ Payment Structure

  • API, Performance, Database & Security Courses: Full payment upon completion
  • Web, Mobile & AI Automation Courses:
    • 50% after the first month
    • Remaining 50% at course completion
  • Risk-YOUR_OPENAI_KEY_HERE: Cancel anytime within the first month ‚Äì no fees

‚úÖ Requirements for Enrollment

  • Must have basic knowledge of any programming language (preferably Java)
  • If you don‚Äôt have this background, please watch the first 60 videos of this YouTube Programming Basics Playlist before enrolling.
  • Completion of all assigned projects and tasks by deadlines
  • Active participation in sessions and assignments
  • Failure to meet requirements may affect future course access

üéÅ Free Mentorship

Have questions or need personalized guidance? Connect on LinkedIn:

Shady Ahmed ‚Äì LinkedIn

‚è≥ Course Duration

2 to 3 months depending on pace and availability.

üí¨ Ready to get started? Fill out the form below to begin your journey into professional API automation.
© 2025 Shady Ahmed | Testing Automation Instructor

values.fieldLabel: Do you have basics of any programming language?
I commit to 3 days per week for 2-3 months

values.option: I agree to follow all deadlines and complete assigned tasks/projects

parameters.content:
### Student Enrollment










This workflow starts **automatically** when a new student submits the enrollment form for the training program.
